Name: A=B
About the game: A=B is a programming puzzle game with only one instruction: A=B, which means replacing A with B. In the game, you can: Solve various problems with this minimal language. From replacing each letter with its uppercase, to multiply two binary numbers. Challenge yourself by using the least possible number of lines. Discover the true power of A=B. And, play the built-in minigame. (A must-have for a zachlike)
